1537650.name: Save the Pirate: Tribal Legacy
1537650.description: Save the Pirate: Tribal Legacy tells the story of a pirate and his lover's treasure hunt on the island of the Nibelungs. The player needs to be smart and make the right choices in order to complete the story successfully and help the heroes find and collect treasures. The main goal - the pirate must reach the treasure tomb and escape from the Nibelungs. To complete the game successfully, you need to use your logic and make the right choice from the two available.
1537650.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 乌克兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
